## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c5569d9f5d17acc6330446faa4b9f8eff7b389a4cde9698946b8473c5bd8e74e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'lodestone' @ 0.0.58 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
